prd_context.how_it_works: Leave Management in Bayzat allows HR admins to configure leave policies including accruals, carry-overs, and approval workflows. Employees can submit leave requests, including hourly leaves, which follow configured approval flows. Leave salary and encashment features integrate with payroll to manage paid leave payouts and unused leave compensation. Approval flows can be standard or advanced, supporting custom roles and multi-level approvers. The system supports job tenure-based allowances and dynamic pay rate calculations for compliance with labor laws.
key_steps: Create and assign leave policies with tenure-based allowances and accrual rules.
Configure leave approval flows (standard or advanced) with roles and sequential or parallel approvals.
Enable and configure hourly leave options with hours-to-day conversion.
Set up leave salary policies including pay components and proration settings.
Configure leave encashment policies and eligibility criteria.
Manage leave requests through configured approval workflows.
Integrate leave salary and encashment with payroll processing.
Configure job tenure exclusions and custom pay rate conditions for unpaid leaves.
Pause leave accrual automatically based on leave types and durations.
Provide employees and managers with leave balance visibility and request management.
business_rules: Leave salary and encashment only apply to paid leave types; unpaid leaves are excluded.
Leave approval flows require explicit configuration and may need backend activation.
Leave accrual can be paused automatically based on unpaid leave thresholds.
Leave balances are calculated based on calendar or working days as per policy.
Multiple approvers per approval step provide redundancy; ultimate approver can bypass chain.
Leave requests spanning multiple cycles are restricted or require manual handling.
Job tenure affects leave allowances and accruals, with dynamic adjustments on tenure milestones.
Negative leave balances are generally not allowed; manual adjustments are limited.
Leave encashment requires minimum accrued days and job tenure for eligibility.
Payroll integration requires consistent salary configuration and approval workflows.
edge_cases: Approver unavailability requires delegation or workaround to prevent approval bottlenecks.
Urgent leave requests may bypass standard approval chains via ultimate approver role.
Leave requests edited after approval may affect payroll calculations and require manual reconciliation.
Employees on probation may be restricted from leave salary or encashment.
Shift scheduling and hourly leave interactions require careful handling to avoid attendance conflicts.
Leave balance recalculations on policy changes do not retroactively affect past requests.
Public holiday exclusions do not update past leave requests automatically.
Leave encashment calculations depend on salary components and working day types configured.
Multiple leave policies for the same leave type require careful management to avoid conflicts.
Leave requests for offboarding employees require special handling to prevent misuse.

synthesis.feature_overview: Leave Management in Bayzat provides comprehensive tools for configuring leave policies, managing leave requests, and integrating leave with payroll processes. It supports various leave types including hourly leaves, accrual-based policies, and leave encashment. Approval workflows can be customized for different organizational needs, ensuring efficient leave request processing.

key_workflows_to_cover: Configuring leave policies including accruals, carry-overs, and job tenure conditions.

Submitting and approving leave requests including hourly leave options.

warnings_for_users: Leave approval workflows may not be immediately available and require support activation.
Leave requests that span multiple leave cycles may be rejected or cause errors.
Negative leave balances are restricted; submitting leave beyond balance may be blocked.
Leave encashment requests require approval and may not be fully automated.
Payroll impact of leave requests may not be visible during approval; manual checks advised.
Editing processed leave requests can affect payroll and requires careful handling.
Leave balance calculations may differ between modules; always verify balances before requesting leave.
Unpaid leave policies have specific exclusions and may affect job tenure calculations.
Leave accrual pausing applies only to configured leave types and minimum days thresholds.
Custom roles and approval flows require precise configuration to avoid approval delays.
